title: OpenAI’s open model is delayed
summary: OpenAI was targeting an early summer release date for its open model, which is slated to have similar "reasoning" capabilities to OpenAI's o-series of models.
content: OpenAI was targeting an early summer release date for its open model, which is slated to have similar "reasoning" capabilities to OpenAI's o-series of models.

title: Vijay Pande, founding partner of a16z bio and health strategy, steps down
summary: Since its founding in 2014, a16z Bio+ Health has raised four funds of nearly $3 billion each, including a $1.5 billion fund that closed in 2022.
content: Since its founding in 2014, a16z Bio+ Health has raised four funds of nearly $3 billion each, including a $1.5 billion fund that closed in 2022.

title: AI storage platform Vast Data aimed for $25B valuation in new round, sources say
summary: The AI-friendly data storage startup is raising capital at a giant leap in valuation.
content: The AI-friendly data storage startup is raising capital at a giant leap in valuation.

title: Apple Intelligence: Everything you need to know about Apple’s AI model and services
summary: Apple Intelligence was designed to leverage things that generative AI already does well, like text and image generation, to improve upon existing features.
content: Apple Intelligence was designed to leverage things that generative AI already does well, like text and image generation, to improve upon existing features.

title: YouTube says its ecosystem created 490K jobs and added $55B to the US GDP in 2024
summary: YouTube's impact report shows that the creator economy has continued to grow, despite less interest from venture capitalists.
content: YouTube's impact report shows that the creator economy has continued to grow, despite less interest from venture capitalists.

title: OpenAI releases o3-pro, a souped-up version of its o3 AI reasoning model
summary: OpenAI has launched o3-pro, an AI model that the company claims is its most capable yet.
content: OpenAI has launched o3-pro, an AI model that the company claims is its most capable yet.

title: Bedrock Ocean dredges up $25M to map the seafloor with robots
summary: Bedrock Ocean wants to use autonomous underwater vehicles to make mapping the seafloor faster and cheaper.
content: Bedrock Ocean wants to use autonomous underwater vehicles to make mapping the seafloor faster and cheaper.

title: Whole Foods tells staff cyberattack at its primary distributor UNFI will affect product availability
summary: The retail giant described the food shortages as "temporary supply challenges" following the cyberattack at its primary distributor, UNFI.
content: The retail giant described the food shortages as "temporary supply challenges" following the cyberattack at its primary distributor, UNFI.

title: Why VCs should care about TechCrunch All Stage 2025
summary: Let’s be honest: Most events aren’t built for VCs — they’re built around VCs. Panels, keynotes, maybe a few startups worth watching, and a sea of business cards you’ll forget by dinner. title: Love it or hate it? Apple’s new ‘Liquid Glass’ design is getting mixed reviews
summary: Some users and designers are already panning Apple's new user interface dubbed Liquid Glass, even though it's a bit early. There are reasons to think it might improve — but also valid critiques.
content: Some users and designers are already panning Apple's new user interface dubbed Liquid Glass, even though it's a bit early. There are reasons to think it might improve — but also valid critiques.

title: Atlassian rival Linear raises $82M at $1.25B valuation
summary: Linear, an enterprise software maker that competes with many of Atlassian's products, announced that it raised $82 million in a Series C funding round led by Accel.
content: Linear, an enterprise software maker that competes with many of Atlassian's products, announced that it raised $82 million in a Series C funding round led by Accel.

title: Google rolls out Android 16 to Pixel phones, unveils AI-powered edit suggestion for Google Photos
summary: Google is releasing Android 16 to Pixel phones and rolling out additional updates to other Pixel devices.
content: Google is releasing Android 16 to Pixel phones and rolling out additional updates to other Pixel devices.

title: Snap plans to sell lightweight, consumer AR glasses in 2026
summary: Snap is back with a new pair of AR smart glasses, and for the first time in years, it’s ready to sell them to consumers. The company plans to sell these new glasses, called Specs, to consumers starting in 2026, CEO Evan Spiegel announced on Tuesday during the Augmented World Expo in Long Beach, California. […]

title: Threads is finally getting a DM inbox
summary: Mark Zuckerberg said today that Meta's social network Threads is finally testing a separate DM inbox that is separate from your Instagram DM Inbox.
content: Mark Zuckerberg said today that Meta's social network Threads is finally testing a separate DM inbox that is separate from your Instagram DM Inbox.

title: Apple’s upgraded AI models underwhelm on performance
summary: Apple has announced updates to the AI models that power its suite of Apple Intelligence features across iOS, macOS, and more. But according to the company's own benchmarks, the models underperform older models from rival tech firms including OpenAI.
content: Apple has announced updates to the AI models that power its suite of Apple Intelligence features across iOS, macOS, and more. But according to the company's own benchmarks, the models underperform older models from rival tech firms including OpenAI.

title: Enterprise AI startup Glean lands a $7.2B valuation
summary: Glean announced on Tuesday that is raised a $150 million Series F led by Wellington Management at a $7.2 billion valuation.
content: Glean announced on Tuesday that is raised a $150 million Series F led by Wellington Management at a $7.2 billion valuation.

title: At WWDC 2025, Apple sang developers’ praises amid AI letdowns and App Store battles
summary: Apple has yet to deliver on some of the key technology advances that could modernize developers' apps for the AI era.
content: Apple has yet to deliver on some of the key technology advances that could modernize developers' apps for the AI era.

title: Report: Meta taps Scale AI’s Alexandr Wang to join new ‘superintelligence’ lab
summary: Mark Zuckerberg is hand-picking top researchers and engineers to join an upcoming  AI research lab dedicated to “superintelligence," and Scale AI's Alexandr Wang is on the list.
content: Mark Zuckerberg is hand-picking top researchers and engineers to join an upcoming  AI research lab dedicated to “superintelligence," and Scale AI's Alexandr Wang is on the list.
